footer.appDownload: Start by downloading the Finpro mobile app from the App Store or Google Play.

faq.title: FAQs
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the product and billing. Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please chat to our friendly team.

payment.title: How and when do I get paid?
payment.description: Payments are processed within 24 hours after the client approves your work. You can withdraw your earnings through various payment methods including bank transfer, PayPal, and digital wallets.

merchant.title: Are you the merchant of record?
merchant.description: Yes, we handle all payment processing and act as the merchant of record for all transactions on our platform, ensuring secure and compliant financial operations.

international.title: Can I sell in other countries?
international.description: Yes, you can offer your services globally. Our platform supports multiple currencies and international transactions, making it easy to work with clients worldwide.

website.title: What if I already have a website?
website.description: You can still use our platform alongside your existing website. Many professionals use both to maximize their reach and opportunities while maintaining their independent presence.

email.title: How does my email plan work?
email.description: Our email system is integrated with your account. You'll receive notifications about new projects, client messages, and payment updates directly to your registered email address.
